trans-unit.source: Represents calling a constructor and initializing one or more members of the new object.
Use the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.MemberInit%2A> factory methods to create a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression>.
The value of the <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.Expression.NodeType%2A> property of a <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression> is <xref:System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.MemberInit>.
Gets the bindings that describe how to initialize the members of the newly created object.
A <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> of <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.MemberBinding"></xref> objects which describe how to initialize the members.
Gets a value that indicates whether the expression tree node can be reduced.
True if the node can be reduced, otherwise false.
Gets the expression that represents the constructor call.
A <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.NewExpression"></xref> that represents the constructor call.
Returns the node type of this Expression.
Extension nodes should return <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType.Extension"></xref> when overriding this method.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionType"></xref> of the expression.
Reduces the <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression"></xref> to a simpler expression.
If the `CanReduce` method returns true, this method should return a valid expression.
This method is allowed to return another node which itself must be reduced.
The reduced expression.
Gets the static type of the expression that this <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.Expression"></xref> represents.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression.Type"></xref> that represents the static type of the expression.
Creates a new expression that is like this one, but using the supplied children.
If all of the children are the same, it will return this expression.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression.NewExpression"></xref> property of the result.
The <xref href="System.Linq.Expressions.MemberInitExpression.Bindings"></xref> property of the result.
This expression if no children are changed or an expression with the updated children.
